prompts: Create a flower-themed Pokemon that uses plant powers in battle.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a rose, with vibrant petals and a green body.
Generate a Pokemon with a graceful appearance and a unique mix of red and blue colors.
Make a nature-inspired Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and loves to battle.
Imagine a Pokemon that has both Grass and Poison types, showcasing stunning floral features.
Design a Pokemon that combines the elegance of flowers with a fierce fighting spirit.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the beauty of nature while being a formidable opponent.

distinctive_features: Red rose on one side and blue flower on the other
